name: BomberGast
description:
This game is a bomberman game just like any other. But in this game, you can play along with many friends, on pc or mobile! You can play with up to 4 players in total. Just create a room, give it a name, set your own nickname, and start playing! The others can just set their nickname, and then join the room they want.

You can also customize your character. You can change the color with the RGB sliders, and you can equip many hats that you can buy with the gold you've earned while playing.

There are many different maps that will randomly be selected. There are also many different power ups you can pick up. But there's also a chance for a curse. There are 4 power ups in total. You can improve your movement speed, gain extra bombs, improve explosion range and decrease bomb timer. There are currently 2 different curses that will randomly be selected once you touch one. Either your controls will be inverted, or you'll constantly place bombs. There's also a power up that randomly chooses a power up, or even a curse. So watch out!

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Spacebar to place bomb
  • Return key to start chatting
